Critical angle C is calculated as sin(C) = 1/n, so C = 30°.
The diagram shows a square ABCO with an arc AC centered at O.
If the light ray along DB direction just undergoes total internal reflection on the AB side, then ∠ADF = 30°.
If the light ray along DG direction just undergoes total internal reflection on the BC side, then ∠CDG = 30°.
